title: Boycotting Cosmic Reaver Kassadin
body:
A lot of you have raised your concerns in the comment section about Cosmic Reaver Kassadin. Let me highlight some Summoners comments in case you didn't have a chance to read them. Of course you can read a whole lot more here:

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/skin-release/galaxies-crumble-cosmic-reaver-kassadin

----
> Alright, I don't comment much but I feel the need to let my frustrations be known. Either we shouldn't have to pay for the server skin or everyone in every other server should have to pay for theirs. There is enough discrimination against OCE in terms of over-costed games etc. I expected better of you Rito.
> I donate to charity already and would rather it come off my tax than yours. Would make an exception to that if it wasn't our SERVER SKIN. In fact people would probably be praising you for the charity if it wasn't the server skin.
> 
>  Tristicus  - about 14 hours ago

---

> We got a free Pool party Ziggs skin as a placeholder. And now, 2 years down the line, this skin was made a server skin as an afterthought, and we still have to pay. 
> 
>  Metroxis  - about 16 hours ago

----

> And so did Russia who actually got 2 free skins at launch and then also got their server skin for free some months later. Or Turkey who got 2 free skins at launch, one being their server skin, and then a second server skin a year later.
> 
>  Faleriana  - about 20 hours ago

----

> I have more than 30 skins including almost all legendary skins but I will NOT buy this skin as a protest to the fact that we have to pay for our server skin. Rito for really? we have to pay for our skin?? Bulls*t!!  . If charity is your excuse let the whole world do charity with a separate charity skin or even a charity bundle. I will surely buy that whole bundle. But this is soo bs. Server skin should be free.
> 
>  deamonpog  - about 16 hours ago

-----
Now in my own opinion I think all of these people have valid concerns. When watching the video the skin did not even look as nice as i thought it was going to. He literally just looks blue, I can't even see the stars except for recalling. 

QUESTION: Did any of you actually ever suggest having the Southern Cross as a skin idea?

We're going to be stuck with this unless we as a community take control and raise awareness. Feel free to discuss below.
